text:
e="preserve">Guro Fjellanger (26 January 1964 – 16 April 2019) was a Norwegian politician. She was a member of the Liberal Party. She served as Minister of the Environment from 1997 to 2000. She held this role in the first cabinet of Prime Minister Kjell Magne Bondevik. She also served as the president of the Young Liberals of Norway from 1986 to 1988.
Fjellanger was born in Bergen. She had spina bifida since birth. She died on 16 April 2019, at the age of 55.
